cause.description:
RSD or CRPS is a chronic progressive disease characterized by severe pain, swelling and changes in the skin. RSD is by far the most painful form of Chronic Pain that exists today. On the Mcgee Pain scale from 0-50, RSD is a huge 42. Your help is needed to get the word about RSD and other Chronic Progressive Diseases.
1. We believe that there is going to be a cure in the future, and getting out the word and helping people understand it, will help us reach that cure even faster.
cause.mission: To spread the word about RSD/CRPS, and fight for a cure.
cause.name: Painfully Obvious
